about_the_game:
This is a special set of products that gives you access to all of the following additional contents.
※The items included in the Relayer Advanced Season Pass can also be purchased separately. Please be careful not to purchase more than one item.
※To use this content, you will need the full version of the game, which is sold separately. Please update your software to the latest patch version before using the content.
※The distribution date is subject to change without notice. Please note that the delivery date is subject to change without notice.

■Stellar Gear NEXT" 8-plane set

【Items to be obtained】
・Mars's Neo Mars NEXT, "Mars's Battle data +".
Delivery on October 27, 2022

・Venus's Amatsu-Mikaboshi NEXT, "Venus's Battle data +".
Delivery on October 27, 2022

・Luna's Selene NEXT, "Luna's Battle data +".
Scheduled for delivery on November 24, 2022

・Jupiter's Feretrius NEXT, "Jupiter's Battle data +"
Scheduled to be distributed on November 24, 2022

・Saturn's Quadriga NEXT, "Saturn's Battle data +"
Scheduled to be distributed on November 24, 2022

・Pluto's Tenmu Asuka NEXT, "Pluto's Battle data +"
Scheduled to be distributed on November 24, 2022

・Nile's Dog Star NEXT, "Nile's Battle data +"
Scheduled to be distributed on November 24, 2022

・Eight's Trident NEXT, "Eight's Battle data +"
Scheduled to be distributed on November 24, 2022
detailed_description:
This is a special set of products that gives you access to all of the following additional contents.
※The items included in the Relayer Advanced Season Pass can also be purchased separately. Please be careful not to purchase more than one item.
※To use this content, you will need the full version of the game, which is sold separately. Please update your software to the latest patch version before using the content.
※The distribution date is subject to change without notice. Please note that the delivery date is subject to change without notice.

■Stellar Gear NEXT" 8-plane set

【Items to be obtained】
・Mars's Neo Mars NEXT, "Mars's Battle data +".
Delivery on October 27, 2022

・Venus's Amatsu-Mikaboshi NEXT, "Venus's Battle data +".
Delivery on October 27, 2022

・Luna's Selene NEXT, "Luna's Battle data +".

・Eight's Trident NEXT, "Eight's Battle data +"

name: RelayerAdvanced DLC - Season Pass

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Core i5-6402P
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce GTX 960
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 20 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX 11 compatible soundcard
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Core i5-7600K
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce GTX 1080
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 40 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX 11 compatible soundcard

short_description: A special set of 8 fully customized next generation Stellar Gear "Stellar Gear NEXT". Utilize the character-specific custom chips together to lead your forces to victory!
supported_languages:
English*, French, Italian, German, Spanish - Spain, Traditional Chinese, Japanese*, Korean
*languages with full audio support
